'''David and Goliath''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series III]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to paralyze a [[Ruin Grader]] by attacking its weak point.

==Notes==
* The Ruin Grader has a weak point on its eye, as well as two on its legs. All weak points must be disabled to get the achievement. When the Ruin Grader is in a vulnerable state, these points will light up.

==Trivia==
* {{w|Goliath#Modern_usage of "David and Goliath"|"David and Goliath"}} is a term commonly used to refer to situations where there is a clear underdog, especially when the underdog ends up winning despite being smaller or weaker. It dates back to a biblical story about a giant called Goliath being defeated by {{w|David}}.
